verses.roman:
dvitīye--choṭa-haridāse karāilā śikṣana
tāra madhye śivānandera āścarya darśana

synonyms: dvitīye—in the Second Chapter; choṭa-haridāse—Junior Haridāsa; karāilā śikṣaṇa—He taught very strictly; tāra madhye—within that chapter; śivānandera—of Śivānanda Sena; āścarya darśana—the wonderful vision.
translation: In the Second Chapter the Lord instructively punished Junior Haridāsa. Also in that chapter is the wonderful vision of Śivānanda Sena.
